name: Alex Summers
text: Rest & Recharge — Action: Remove 1 plasma counter from here → heal 2 damage from Alex Summers. Search your deck and discard pile for a Cosmic Energy resource and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.)

name: Havok
text: Plasma Generation — Response: After you pay for a card using only [energy] resources, place 1 plasma counter on Havok (to a maximum of 3). “You keep this up and soon...you'll cry Havok!”

name: Polaris
text: Hero Response: After Polaris enters play, place 1 plasma counter on Havok (to a maximum of 3). If this places the third plasma counter on Havok, each player may choose a card in their discard pile and add it to their hand.

name: Energy Absorption
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage from an attack, prevent up to 4 of that damage. Then, if you took no damage from that attack, you may place a plasma counter on Havok (to a maximum of 3). “C'mon, give me all you've got!” —Havok

name: Plasma Blast
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy, plus 2 additional damage for each plasma counter on Havok. This attack gains overkill. “I've been afraid of letting loose ever since I first manifested my powers. But here goes!” —Havok

name: Plasma Burst
text: Hero Action: Resolve the "Special" ability on Plasma Discharge. “With everything that's been happening, I actually find this pretty cathartic.” —Havok

name: Wreak Havoc
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme, plus 1 additional threat for each plasma counter on Havok. You may remove a plasma counter from Havok to repeat this thwart on another scheme once.

name: Cosmic Energy
text: Interrupt: When you spend this card, choose to either generate an additional [energy] resource or place 1 plasma counter on Havok (to a maximum of 3).

name: Containment Suit
text: Hero Interrupt: When you would resolve the "Special" ability on Plasma Discharge, exhaust Containment Suit and choose a player → deal 3 damage to the villain and each minion engaged with that player instead.

name: Controlled Blast
text: Hero Interrupt: When you would resolve the "Special" ability on Plasma Discharge, remove 1 threat from each scheme instead. “You'd be surprised how many problems you can solve with a controlled plasma blast.” —Havok

name: Plasma Discharge
text: Permanent. Setup. Forced Response: After you place a third plasma counter on Havok, remove all plasma counters on him. Resolve this card's "Special" ability. Special: Deal 1 damage to each enemy. “You keep this up and soon...you'll cry Havok!” —Havok

name: Brothers 'Til the End
text: Team-Up (Cyclops and Havok). Max 1 per deck. Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Deal 1 damage to each other enemy. This attack gains ranged. “Just like old times, eh Alex?” —Cyclops
